title: Total brand value major sports leagues ( NFL , MLB , NBA & NHL ) 2013
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) for 4 number of Sports Leagues.
The Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) is highest at Sports League National Football League and lowest at Sports League National Hockey League.
The highest Sports League National Football League has 7571.4 more Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) than the lowest Sports League National Hockey League.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Sports League in the x axis and Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) in the y axis.
The Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) is highest at Sports League National Football League and lowest at Sports League National Hockey League.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) for 4 number of Sports Leagues.
The Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) is highest at Sports League National Football League and lowest at Sports League National Hockey League.
The highest Sports League National Football League has 7571.4 more Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) than the lowest Sports League National Hockey League.
max_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Sports League, and Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) in each Sports League on the y axis.
The Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) is highest at Sports League National Football League and lowest at Sports League National Hockey League.
Sports League National Hockey League has 5.85 times less Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) than Sports League National Football League which is the highest.

Sports League National Football League is higher than any other Sports Leagues with value 9131.8, followed by , and National Basketball Association. Down to Sports League National Hockey League with the lowest value 1560.4.
The highest value 9131.8 at National Football League is almost 2.05 times larger than the average value 4458.9.
The Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) is 17835.6 if we add up values of all Sports Leagues.
